casebody.data:
Tignor, Appellee, v. Franklin County Board of Commissioners et al.; Whaley, Deputy, Appellant.

[Cite as Tignor v. Franklin Cty. Bd. of Commrs. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 205.]

(No. 00-1013 Submitted February 28, 2001 Decided March 28, 2001.) Zach Zunshine, for appellee. Hunter, Carnahan & Shoub, Robert.R. Byard and Russell E. Carnahan, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Stevens v. Ademan (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 182, 743 N.E.2d 901.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
